name: First Tastes Bundle
description: Perfect for babies just starting their weaning journey. Five gentle, single-ingredient purees to introduce your little one to the wonderful world of food.

name: Explorer Bundle
description: For adventurous little eaters ready to explore new flavours. Seven delicious combinations with proteins and more exciting textures.

name: Little Foodie Bundle
description: For confident little foodies ready for more grown-up meals. Eight hearty dishes with soft chunks to develop chewing skills.

name: Weaning Starter Kit
description: The complete weaning journey in one box. Eight carefully selected items spanning Stage 1 and 2 to guide your baby through their first food adventures.
